content:
From: bnord <bnord01@gmail.com>
Hi there,

after installing a new TeX Live version I observed that none of my
documents would compile any more. I can still compile the generated
latex files on another machine with an older tex installation. See the
error log below for a simple empty theory (it's the same for every theory).

I could also reproduce the same error with a fresh TeX Live installation
on another (linux) machine (where it still works with the main tex
installation). I also tested this with a fresh Isabelle2013-2 version.

Best Benedikt

Error log:

$ isabelle build -D .
Running SimpleTest ...

SimpleTest FAILED
(see also
/Users/bnord/.isabelle/Isabelle2013-2/heaps/polyml-5.5.1_x86-darwin/log/SimpleTest)

*** (/usr/local/texlive/2013/texmf-dist/tex/context/base/supp-pdf.mkii
*** [Loading MPS to PDF converter (version 2006.09.02).]
*** ) (/usr/local/texlive/2013/texmf-dist/tex/latex/hyperref/nameref.sty

(/usr/local/texlive/2013/texmf-dist/tex/generic/oberdiek/gettitlestring.sty))
*** (./session.tex (./SimpleTest.tex Including 'isadelimtheory' comment.)
*** Runaway argument?
*** ! File ended while scanning use of \next.
*** <inserted text>
*** \par
*** l.1 \input{SimpleTest.tex}

*** ))
*** ! Emergency stop.
*** <*> \nonstopmode\input{root.tex}

*** ! ==> Fatal error occurred, no output PDF file produced!
*** Transcript written on root.log.
*** Document preparation failure in directory 'output/document'

*** Failed to build document
"/Users/bnord/tests/SimpleTest/output/document.pdf"
Unfinished session(s): SimpleTest
0:00:19 elapsed time, 0:00:19 cpu time, factor 1.00

From: Andreas Lochbihler <andreas.lochbihler@inf.ethz.ch>
Hi Benedikt,

Jasmin had the same problem in January, see the following thread:

https://lists.cam.ac.uk/mailman/htdig/cl-isabelle-users/2014-January/msg00142.html

Makarius suggested to copy Isabelle's comment.sty in your document folder to overwrite the
new one from TeXLive.

Andreas
